page.title: 05Home life in Pendlebury
page.content: Our house is on{Bolton Road}which is the main road through{Pendlebury. My mum and dad are buying the house but my dad says it will take twenty years to pay for it. It cost Â£17250 when we bought it three years ago. It has three bedrooms. Mine is painted {red and white}because I support {Manchester United}football team and those are their colours. We have a big garden where my brother and I have to play because we are not allowed to play out on Bolton Road when there are hundreds of{cars and lorries}going by. If I go to the grocers shop on the other side of the road I have to walk along and use the Pelican crossing. Sometimes I go and play with my friend who lives near{Agecroft Colliery.}He lives in a colliery house and his dad is a{miner.}
